title: Leads, Program Coordinator - College Sports
text: Make Your Passion Your Career. â„¢ Work In Sports. Region Map Here is the job that interests you: Leads, Program Coordinator Posted/Updated: 10-02-2015 Brief Job Description: Responsibilities include curriculum development, implementation and execution of programming, management of internal and external communications, and performing other duties as assigned.   Since your site launched in 2000, WorkInSports.com has been the go to place for USA Baseball when we are looking to fill full-time openings and internships. Your reputation throughout the sports industry as a vital tool for job seekers and employers is well deserved. Thanks again! David Perkins
